text: Thawar Chand Gehlot (born 18 May 1948) is an Indian politician. He is the 19th Governor of Karnataka since 2021, being the first person serving as the Governor of Karnataka from Madhya Pradesh. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Karnataka Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Thawar Chand Gehlot
